attributes.action: install, free of charge, wind turbines and/or solar photovoltaic panels for disabled people's homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disabled people can lead the way in renewable technologies, but they can not afford them, so we request that the Government freely give the disabled community the option of free electric via (a minimum 6kwh) wind turbine and/or solar photovoltaic panels fitted to there homes, whether private or social houses.
